Posted By: David Seaborn
There has got to be an N167 out there that someone would part with for a mountain of cash.  Doesn't even have to be a gem.  Somebody just send an email and see what I'll offer!!

Always looking for N300 Mayos too.  I know some of you have them hoarded away.  How about some cash for the upcoming auctions??
